docs.text: Introduction OctoPy is a GitHub GraphQL and Rest Library for Python 3.6+ Installation You can install OctoPy and all the extra dependencies using pip_:: pip install octopy
docs.title: Home

docs.text: OctoPy is a GitHub GraphQL and Rest Library for Python 3.6+
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: You can install OctoPy and all the extra dependencies using pip_:: pip install octopy
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Documentation for the graph_query module. octopy.graph_query.GraphRequest __init__ () Initialize the GraphQL client. _load_query ( path ) Load a query from a file. Attributes: Name Type Description path str Relative path to the query file. _execute ( query , params ) Execute a query. Attributes: Name Type Description query str GraphQL query. params dict Query parameters. octopy.graph_query.GraphQueryProvider Bases: GraphRequest get_enterprise_orgs ( enterprise ) This module returns a generator that will yield a dictionary of all organizations in an Enterprise. Attributes: Name Type Description enterprise str The name of the Enterprise. get_org_repos ( org ) This module returns a generator that will yield a dictionary of all repositories in an organization. Attributes: Name Type Description org str The name of the Organization. get_repo_collaborators ( org , repo ) This module returns a generator that will yield a dictionary of all collaborators in a repository. Attributes: Name Type Description org str The name of the Organization. repo str The name of the Repository. octopy.graph_query.GraphMutationProducer Bases: GraphRequest add_enterprise_org ( organization ) This module adds an Enterprise organization to the GitHub Enterprise. Attributes: Name Type Description organization str The name of the Organization. add_repository ( repository ) This module adds a repository to the GitHub Enterprise. Attributes: Name Type Description repository str The name of the Repository. octopy.graph_query.GraphQueryResponseTransmuter Bases: GraphQueryProvider get_org_list ( enterprise ) This module returns a list of all organizations in an Enterprise. Attributes: Name Type Description enterprise str The name of the Enterprise. get_repo_list ( org ) This module returns a list of all repositories in an organization. Attributes: Name Type Description org str The name of the Organization. get_collaborators_permission_list ( org , repo ) This module returns a list of tuples of all collaborators in a repository with their permission level. Attributes: Name Type Description org str The name of the Organization. repo str The name of the Repository.
docs.title: Reference
